title: Am I addicted to my smartwatch?
description: Do they do what they say they do, or are they just making us more stressed?
content:
There's a feeling of anticipation. I can see the cold breath coming from my competitors as they do the "about to run" wiggle on the start line.
A quick flick of the hips.

title: 'Life being stressful is not an illness' - GPs on mental health over-diagnosis
description: Hundreds of GPs in England tell the BBC they are also worried about a lack of help for patients.
content:
Hundreds of GPs across England have told the BBC they think mental health problems are being over-diagnosed.
One commonly-held view by family doctors, our research suggests, is that society tends to over-medicalise normal life stresses. But they're a... [4827 chars]

title: Failed Sarah Ferguson-backed app took £1m taxpayers' money
description: The former Duchess was an "ambassador" for vVoosh, founded by her friend Manuel Fernandez.
content:
A lifestyle app backed by Sarah Ferguson received more than £1m of taxpayers' money but collapsed without ever launching a product, according to documents filed this week.
vVoosh was founded by Manuel Fernandez, a close friend of Ms Ferguson, who onc... [4003 chars]

title: Frank Gehry, one of the world's most innovative architects, dies aged 96
description: His famous buildings include the Guggenheim Museum in Bilbao, Spain. Gehry won every major prize architecture.
content:
Frank Gehry, who won global acclaim for designing some of the world's most imaginative buildings has died aged 96.
His triumphs included the Guggenheim Museum in Bilbao, Spain; the Walt Disney Concert Hall in Los Angeles and Berlin's DZ Bank Building... [1489 chars]

title: Five takeaways from the blockbuster Netflix Warner Brothers deal
description: It might seem like a simple merger deal, but it's got all the ingredients of a Hollywood drama.
content:
It sounds like a simple merger deal, but it's got all the ingredients of a Hollywood drama: a rich and powerful suitor, political intrigue, and plenty of cliff-hangers.
